seed_pair.target: Queríamos saber qué iba a pasar.
seed_pair.known: We wanted to know what was going to happen.

seed_pair.target: Nadie estaba seguro de cómo responder la pregunta.
seed_pair.known: Nobody was sure how to answer the question.

seed_pair.target: ¿Qué harías si te pidiera que me ayudaras?
seed_pair.known: What would you do if I asked you to help me?

seed_pair.target: Quería que ella te ayudara a tratar con los arreglos.
seed_pair.known: I wanted her to help you to deal with the arrangements.

seed_pair.target: He olvidado la palabra que estaba intentando decir.
seed_pair.known: I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.

seed_pair.target: Disfruto la oportunidad de practicar hablar contigo.
seed_pair.known: I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.

seed_pair.target: Has hecho lo que necesitabas hacer.
seed_pair.known: You've done what you needed to do.
I didn't want to ask you how to say it.

seed_pair.target: Quieren pasar más tiempo reuniéndose como grupo.
seed_pair.known: They want to spend more time meeting as a group.

seed_pair.target: Piensan que necesitamos discutir el problema.
seed_pair.known: They think that we need to discuss the problem.
